Burkina FasoBFAOuagadougou270,7647,964,70510,312,60914,017,26220,505,15523,409,000→

Due to the security situation during the 2019 census, population figures for 7 communes were completely estimated and counts were enhanced by estimates in the case of 31 communes. 313 communes were fully counted.

Institut National de la Statistique et de la Demographie, Burkina Faso.
